content.text:
# Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip (disambiguation)

Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip is the full-scale Israeli ground invasion of the Hamas-ruled Gaza Strip since 2023.
It may also refer to other events in the Arab–Israeli conflict:
* Suez Crisis, which involved a brief Israeli occupation of the Egyptian-occupied Gaza Strip in 1956
* Six-Day War, which resulted in Israel capturing the Gaza Strip from Egypt in 1967
* Gaza War (2008–2009), involving a partial Israeli ground invasion of the Hamas-ruled Gaza Strip
* 2014 Gaza War, involving a partial Israeli ground invasion of the Hamas-ruled Gaza Strip
